    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet BasePayload_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:BasePayload_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<BasePayload xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <PayloadStdAttributes altLangID="es" correlationID="Example String Value" echoToken="Example String Value" primaryLangID="en" retransmissionIndicatorInd="true" sequenceNmbr="Example String Value" target="Test" targetName="Example String Value" timeStamp="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" transactionIdentifier="Example String Value" transactionStatusCode="Start" version="12"/>
    <POS>
        <Source agentDutyCode="Example String Value" agentSine="Example String Value" airlineVendorID="B6" airportCode="IAD" eRSP_UserID="Example String Value" firstDepartPoint="Example String Value" iSOCountry="IR" iSOCurrency="USD" pseudoCityCode="Example String Value" terminalID="Example String Value">
            <RequestorIDDetail messagePassword="Example String Value" personName="Example String Value">
                <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
            </RequestorIDDetail>
            <Position altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00"/>
            <BookingChannel primaryInd="true">
                <CompanyName code="AI" codeContext="Example String Value" department="Adventure department" description="Example String Value" division="Travel Division" shortName="Adventure Inc">Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated</CompanyName>
                <Type>Agent</Type>
            </BookingChannel>
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <ProcessingInfo displayCurrency="USD" positiveInteger="1234" summaryResultsInd="true"/>
</BasePayload>

      Example JSON

      {
  "BasePayload" : {
    "PayloadStdAttributes" : {
      "value" : null,
      "echoToken" : "Example String Value",
      "timeStamp" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
      "target" : "Test",
      "targetName" : "Example String Value",
      "version" : 12,
      "transactionIdentifier" : "Example String Value",
      "sequenceNmbr" : "Example String Value",
      "transactionStatusCode" : "Start",
      "correlationID" : "Example String Value",
      "primaryLangID" : "en",
      "altLangID" : "es",
      "retransmissionIndicatorInd" : true
    },
    "POS" : {
      "@type" : "POS",
      "Source" : [ {
        "@type" : "Source",
        "agentSine" : "Example String Value",
        "pseudoCityCode" : "Example String Value",
        "iSOCountry" : "IR",
        "iSOCurrency" : "USD",
        "agentDutyCode" : "Example String Value",
        "airlineVendorID" : "B6",
        "airportCode" : "IAD",
        "firstDepartPoint" : "Example String Value",
        "eRSP_UserID" : "Example String Value",
        "terminalID" : "Example String Value",
        "RequestorID" : {
          "@type" : "RequestorIDDetail",
          "messagePassword" : "Example String Value",
          "personName" : "Example String Value",
          "Identifier" : {
            "value" : "guid12345",
            "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
            "system" : "sysABC3344",
            "organization" : "Acme"
          }
        },
        "Position" : {
          "value" : null,
          "latitude" : "Example String Value",
          "longitude" : "Example String Value",
          "altitude" : "Example String Value",
          "altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum" : "Miles",
          "mapURL" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",
          "formatURL" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
        },
        "BookingChannel" : {
          "@type" : "BookingChannel",
          "primaryInd" : true,
          "CompanyName" : {
            "value" : "Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated",
            "division" : "Travel Division",
            "department" : "Adventure department",
            "shortName" : "Adventure Inc",
            "code" : "AI",
            "codeContext" : "Example String Value",
            "description" : "Example String Value"
          },
          "Type" : {
            "value" : "Agent"
          }
        }
      } ]
    },
    "ProcessingInfo" : {
      "value" : null,
      "displayCurrency" : "USD",
      "positiveInteger" : 1234,
      "summaryResultsInd" : true
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        PayloadStdAttributes
        The standard attributes that appear on the root element for all OpenTravel messages.
        Details
        Type PayloadStdAttributes
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        POS
        Point of Sale (POS) identifies the party or connection channel making the request.
        Details
        Type POS
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ProcessingInfo
        Transaction processing directives, including display currency overrides. If no display currency information is provided, the display and pricing currency will default to the value in POS/Source/@ISOCurrency.
        Details
        Type ProcessingInfo
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
